newsitem.title: ITALY: Italy Aug CPI seen at 3.3/3.4 pct yr/yr - analysts.
newsitem.headline: Italy Aug CPI seen at 3.3/3.4 pct yr/yr - analysts.

text.p: Italian consumer prices are estimated rising at 3.3/3.4 percent year on year in August and at 0.1 percent month-on-month, according to analysts' estimates based on preliminary data from 10 sample cities on Thursday.

This confirms analysts' forecasts based on the first six cities' data released Wednesday estimating rates of 3.3/3.4 percent and 0.0/0.1 percent respectively. Forecasts before the data were for 3.4 percent year on year.
In July, Italian CPI grew 3.6 percent year on year but fell 0.2 percent on a month on month basis.
Final August CPI will be published by national statistics institute ISTAT on September 5.
The 10 sample cities have a combined weighting of 69.67 percent on the national index.
